00014 #ifndef ULIB_UXML2NODE_H
00015 #define ULIB_UXML2NODE_H 1

00017 #include <ulib/container/vector.h>

00019 #include <libxml/tree.h>
00020 #include <libxml/xpathInternals.h>
00021 
00022 /*
00023 Represents XML Nodes.
00024 You should never new or delete Nodes. The Parser will create and manage them for you.
00025 
00026 struct _xmlNode {
00027         void*                                   _private;       // application data
00028         xmlElementType          type;                   // type number, must be second !
00029         const xmlChar*          name;                   // the name of the node, or the entity
00030         struct _xmlNode*        children;   // parent->childs link
00031         struct _xmlNode*        last;                   // last child link
00032         struct _xmlNode*        parent;         // child->parent link
00033         struct _xmlNode*        next;                   // next sibling link
00034         struct _xmlNode*        prev;                   // previous sibling link
00035         struct _xmlDoc* doc;                    // the containing document
00036         // End of common part
00037         xmlNs*                          ns;                     // pointer to the associated namespace
00038         xmlChar*                                content;                // the content
00039         struct _xmlAttr*        properties;     // properties list
00040         xmlNs*                          nsDef;          // namespace definitions on this node
00041         void*                                   psvi;                   // for type/PSVI informations
00042         unsigned short          line;                   // line number
00043         unsigned short          extra;          // extra data for XPath/XSLT
00044 };
00045 */
00046 
00047 class U_EXPORT UXML2Node {
00048 public:
00049 
00050         // Check for memory error
00051         U_MEMORY_TEST
00052 
00053         // Allocator e Deallocator
00054         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00055         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00056 
00057         // Costruttori
00058 
00059         UXML2Node(xmlNodePtr node) : impl_(node)
00060                 {
00061                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UXML2Node, "%p", node)
00062 
00063                 impl_->_private = this;
00064                 }
00065 
00066         ~UXML2Node()
00067                 {
00068                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UXML2Node)
00069                 }
00070 
00076         const char* getName() const
00077                 {
00078                 U_TRACE(0, "UXML2Node::getName()")
00079 
00080                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00081 
00082                 const char* result = (impl_->name ? (const char*)impl_->name : "");
00083 
00084                 U_RETURN(result);
00085                 }
00086 
00092         void setName(const xmlChar* name)
00093                 {
00094                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::setName(%S)", name)
00095 
00096                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00097 
00098                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlNodeSetName, "%p,%S", impl_, name);
00099                 }
00100 
00101         // Look for existing namespace to use
00102 
00103         xmlNsPtr getNamespace(const xmlChar* ns_prefix)
00104                 {
00105                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::getNamespace(%S)", ns_prefix)
00106 
00107                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00108                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_->doc)
00109 
00110                 // Look for the existing namespace to use
00111 
00112                 xmlNsPtr ns = (xmlNsPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlSearchNs, "%p,%p,%S", impl_->doc, impl_, ns_prefix);
00113 
00114                 U_RETURN_POINTER(ns,xmlNs);
00115                 }
00116 
00117         void setNameSpace(xmlNsPtr ns)
00118                 {
00119                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::setNameSpace(%p)", ns)
00120 
00121                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00122 
00123                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlSetNs, "%p,%S", impl_, ns); // Use it for this element
00124                 }
00125 
00133         bool setNameSpace(const xmlChar* ns_prefix = 0)
00134                 {
00135                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::setNameSpace(%S)", ns_prefix)
00136 
00137                 xmlNsPtr ns = getNamespace(ns_prefix);
00138 
00139                 if (ns)
00140                         {
00141                         setNameSpace(ns);
00142 
00143                         U_RETURN(true);
00144                         }
00145 
00146                 U_RETURN(false);
00147                 }
00148 
00155         void setNameSpaceDeclaration(const char* ns_uri, const char* ns_prefix = 0)
00156                 {
00157                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::setNameSpaceDeclaration(%S,%S)", ns_uri, ns_prefix)
00158 
00159                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00160 
00161                 xmlNsPtr ns = (xmlNsPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlNewNs, "%p,%S,%S", impl_, (const xmlChar*)ns_uri, (const xmlChar*)ns_prefix);
00162 
00163                 setNameSpace(ns);
00164                 }
00165 
00166         const char* getNameSpacePrefix() const
00167                 {
00168                 U_TRACE(0, "UXML2Node::getNameSpacePrefix()")
00169 
00170                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00171 
00172                 // check for impl_ if is actually of type xmlDoc, instead of just xmlNode.
00173                 // This can be an issue when calling this method on a UXML2Node returned by find().
00174                 // Therefore, a call to impl_->ns would be invalid.
00175 
00176                 const char* result = (impl_->type != XML_DOCUMENT_NODE && impl_->ns && impl_->ns->prefix ? (const char*)impl_->ns->prefix : "");
00177 
00178                 U_RETURN(result);
00179                 }
00180 
00181         const char* getNameSpaceUri() const
00182                 {
00183                 U_TRACE(0, "UXML2Node::getNameSpaceUri()")
00184 
00185                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00186 
00187                 // check for impl_ if is actually of type xmlDoc, instead of just xmlNode.
00188                 // This can be an issue when calling this method on a UXML2Node returned by find().
00189                 // Therefore, a call to impl_->ns would be invalid.
00190 
00191                 const char* result = (impl_->type != XML_DOCUMENT_NODE && impl_->ns && impl_->ns->href ? (const char*)impl_->ns->href : "");
00192 
00193                 U_RETURN(result);
00194                 }
00195 
00201         int getLine() const { return XML_GET_LINE(impl_); }
00202 
00208         xmlNodePtr getParent() const { return (impl_->parent && impl_->parent->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE ? impl_->parent : 0); }
00209 
00215         xmlNodePtr getNextSibling() const { return impl_->next; }
00216 
00222         xmlNodePtr getPreviousSibling() const { return impl_->prev; }
00223 
00230         uint32_t getChildren(UVector<xmlNodePtr>& children, const xmlChar* name) const;
00231 
00240         xmlNodePtr addChild(const xmlChar* name, const xmlChar* ns_prefix = 0)
00241                 {
00242                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::addChild(%S,%S)", name, ns_prefix)
00243 
00244                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00245 
00246                 xmlNodePtr node  = 0;
00247                 xmlNodePtr child = createNewChildNode(name, ns_prefix);
00248 
00249                 if (child) node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlAddChild, "%p,%p", impl_, child);
00250 
00251                 U_RETURN_POINTER(node,_xmlNode);
00252                 }
00253 
00263         xmlNodePtr addChild(xmlNodePtr previous_sibling, const xmlChar* name, const xmlChar* ns_prefix = 0)
00264                 {
00265                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::addChild(%p,%S,%S)", previous_sibling, name, ns_prefix)
00266 
00267                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(previous_sibling)
00268 
00269                 xmlNodePtr node  = 0;
00270                 xmlNodePtr child = createNewChildNode(name, ns_prefix);
00271 
00272                 if (child) node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlAddNextSibling, "%p,%p", previous_sibling, child);
00273 
00274                 U_RETURN_POINTER(node,_xmlNode);
00275                 }
00276 
00286         xmlNodePtr addChildBefore(xmlNodePtr next_sibling, const xmlChar* name, const xmlChar* ns_prefix = 0)
00287                 {
00288                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::addChildBefore(%p,%S,%S)", next_sibling, name, ns_prefix)
00289 
00290                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(next_sibling)
00291 
00292                 xmlNodePtr node  = 0;
00293                 xmlNodePtr child = createNewChildNode(name, ns_prefix);
00294 
00295                 if (child) node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlAddPrevSibling, "%p,%p", next_sibling, child);
00296 
00297                 U_RETURN_POINTER(node,_xmlNode);
00298                 }
00299 
00305         static void removeChild(xmlNodePtr node)
00306                 {
00307                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::removeChild(%p)", node)
00308 
00309                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlUnlinkNode, "%p", node);
00310                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlFreeNode,     "%p", node);
00311                 }
00312 
00321         xmlNodePtr importNode(const xmlNodePtr node, bool recursive = true)
00322                 {
00323                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::importNode(%p,%b)", node, recursive)
00324 
00325                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00326                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_->doc)
00327 
00328                 // Create the node, by copying:
00329 
00330                 xmlNodePtr imported_node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlDocCopyNode, "%p,%p,%d", node, impl_->doc, recursive);
00331 
00332                 if (imported_node)
00333                         {
00334                         // Add the node:
00335 
00336                         xmlNodePtr added_node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlAddChild, "%p,%p", impl_, imported_node);
00337 
00338                         if (!added_node)
00339                                 {
00340                                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlFreeNode, "%p", imported_node);
00341 
00342                                 imported_node = 0;
00343                                 }
00344                         }
00345 
00346                 U_RETURN_POINTER(imported_node,_xmlNode);
00347                 }
00348 
00354         const char* getPath() const
00355                 {
00356                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::getPath()")
00357 
00358                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00359 
00360                 const char* path = (const char*) U_SYSCALL(xmlGetNodePath, "%p", impl_);
00361 
00362                 U_RETURN(path);
00363                 }
00364 
00370         uint32_t find(UVector<xmlNodePtr>& vec, const xmlChar* xpath) const
00371                 {
00372                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::find(%p,%S)", &vec, xpath)
00373 
00374                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00375                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_->doc)
00376 
00377                 xmlXPathContextPtr ctxt = (xmlXPathContextPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlXPathNewContext, "%p", impl_->doc);
00378 
00379                 ctxt->node = impl_;
00380 
00381                 return find_impl(vec, ctxt, xpath);
00382                 }
00383 
00390         uint32_t find(UVector<xmlNodePtr>& vec, const xmlChar* xpath, UVector<UString>& namespaces) const
00391                 {
00392                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Node::find(%p,%S,%p)", &vec, xpath, &namespaces)
00393 
00394                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00395                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_->doc)
00396 
00397                 xmlXPathContextPtr ctxt = (xmlXPathContextPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlXPathNewContext, "%p", impl_->doc);
00398 
00399                 ctxt->node = impl_;
00400 
00401                 for (uint32_t i = 0, n = namespaces.size(); i < n; i += 2)
00402                         {
00403                         U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlXPathRegisterNs, "%p,%S,%S", ctxt, (const xmlChar*)namespaces[i].c_str(),
00404                                                                                                                                                                   (const xmlChar*)namespaces[i+1].c_str());
00405                         }
00406 
00407                 return find_impl(vec, ctxt, xpath);
00408                 }
00409 
00410         // Access the underlying libxml2 implementation.
00411 
00412         xmlNodePtr cobj() { return      impl_; }
00413 
00414 #ifdef DEBUG
00415         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00416 #endif
00417 
00418 protected:
00419         xmlNodePtr impl_;
00420 
00421         static uint32_t find_impl(UVector<xmlNodePtr>& vec, xmlXPathContext* ctxt, const xmlChar* xpath);
00422 
00423         // Create the C instance ready to be added to the parent node.
00424 
00425         xmlNodePtr createNewChildNode(const xmlChar* name, const xmlChar* ns_prefix = 0);
00426 
00427 private:
00428    UXML2Node(const UXML2Node&)            {}
00429    UXML2Node& operator=(const UXML2Node&) { return *this; }
00430 };
